January 21, 1955
Mr. John Holt, Manager
NAEB Tape Network
Ik Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Holt:
Please do hold the reservation at the Inman Hotel for Ola and me. • ^
I don’t know her plans but at the present time I plan to come on
Wednesday. Shall need a room Wednesday and Thursday nights.
TIME OUT
3:00 P.M.
Chicago has just called to ask us to send special delivery air mail
handbooks for LET’S FIND OUT and POETS* CORNER. . . n
Somet hing is wrong with the delivery of handbooks. We sent one
hundred and twenty-five (125) to headquarters and have received a
steady flow of letters, telegrams and telephone calls from all over
the United States asking for handbooks. So far we have sent twenty-
four (2U) copies of handbook for this semester's edition of LET'S
FIND OUT.
Let’s discuss this at the committee meeting. ?CL . A
Marguerite Fleming, Director
Station KSLH
